posts.content:
What can be better than camping with your family and friends on Easter weekend?
CamperFest 2014 offers an opportunity to spend a memorable weekend right in the heart of Chester, on the beautiful Chester Racecourse. An event will run on the 19th -21st April in 2014.

As part of your stay you can visit, our ever popular Chester Food, Drink & Lifestyle Festival, lovely local bars, bistros and restaurants, as well as take a short drive to some local family attractions such as: Chester Zoo, Crocky Trails and the Blue Planet Aquarium.
In order to create the best experience possible there will be a number of different activities and smaller events held on site over the weekend.
The Chester Food, Drink & Lifestyle Festival is ranked the third largest payable (FREE to CamperFest Guests) Food & Drink Festival in the UK. The event runs alongside CamperFest, from 19th -21st April in 2014.

Do not miss an amazing opportunity and book your tickets now!

More information about an event can be found on the website: http://chesterfoodanddrink.co.uk/camperfest/
Do not miss an amazing opportunity and book your tickets now at: http://chesterfoodanddrink.co.uk/camperfest/

Anyone has been to the CamperFest before?
Share you experience with others!

Check this out campers! Just goes to show what a beautiful place Chester is seen to be all around the globe!
http://www.dailymail.co.uk/news/article ... er-UK.html

All the more reason to get yourselves down to Camperfest this Easter! Don't forget to book your tickets to CamperFest 2014 at http://chesterfoodanddrink.co.uk/camperfest/
